MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA24 area of Dalry, affecting properties in Aitnock Place and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:26pm due to critical incident at 6 Aitnock Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
